entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gulf Islands (Southern)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Rain beginning after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022
